name: Legends of Baldur's Gate
summary: Legends of Baldur's Gate is a series of Forgotten Realms comic books published by IDW Publishing as part of the Tyranny of Dragons storyline. It is continued in the series Shadows of the Vampire, Frost Giant's Fury and Evil at Baldur's Gate.
